name: Baldy's adventures
description:
Go on an adventure with the our friend baldy! You need to defend off the aliens that have invaded your planet and you need to crawl through some dangerous places hot and cold to beat them and stop them from conquering the world.

If you enjoyed the game be sure to follow me on Twitter: @Flame152152 or https://twitter.com/Flame152152

Instagram: @fflame1522

Facebook: Flame152 - https://www.facebook.com/Flame152-103276837990903

But if you really enjoyed the game and you would like to support my work consider going to Patreon https://www.patreon.com/Flame152
